text: aur jab tum unake saamane koee nishaanee nahin laate to ve kahate hain, "tum svayan koee nishaanee kyon na chhaant lae?" kah do, "main to keval usee ka anusaran karata hoon jo mere rab kee or se prakaashana kee jaatee hai. yah tumhaare rab kee or se antardrshtiyon ka prakaash-punj hai, aur eemaan laanevaalon ke lie maargadarshan aur dayaaluta hai.
